TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it granted as a better wish!

Articles.Content:
Granted they also allow big cats

I wish for my computer to be able to play ksp with all the mods without any lag

Granted, your computer never lags now.

I wish to be able to breathe underwater ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Granted. You can breathe even under milk!

Granted, you get everything now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

(btw never seen a milk pool)

I wish for every steam game there is ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Granted, they also have all DRM removed!

I wish for a new pocketknife.
Granted\_ It's a magical knife!
Um can you put your wish???

Granted, but you can't see it.

I wish for VERY large amounts of money.

Granted! The large amounts of money DO NOT CAUSE INFLATION! YAY.

I wish for a can of chili.

> 
> Granted! The large amounts of money DO NOT CAUSE INFLATION! YAY.
> I wish for a can of chili.

Granted. The can is made of chili.

Granted. You get another wish!

I wish for pizza.

Granted, it comes with free garlic fingers!

I wish for a private jet.

Granted, it's filled with famous people you want to meet.

I wish to be famous on YT/Twitch, and have large amounts of money.

No wish posted? Well, whatever it was, it's granted as a better wish!

I wish for a mochi water cake. Really curious to taste one.

> 
> No wish posted? Well, whatever it was, it's granted as a better wish!
> I wish for a mochi water cake. Really curious to taste one.

I think you're late

Granted. You're now early!

I wish for chocolate.

Not only do you get chocolate, everyone in the world gets chocolate!

I wish my ore measuring satellite didn't launch today.

Granted. Someone else launches a different ore scanner, and they give you the results for free!

I wish to go Mach 3.

Granted! This wish is granted by giving you a high-powered suit like Iron Man's.

I wish for sparkles.

Granted, you get rainbow sparkles!

I wish to be awesome

Sorry, no can do. You already are!

I wish for a pleasure/happiness box, as talked about in philosophy.

Granted! It makes you happy FOREVER

I wish for my own space program.

Granted. You get funding from all over! As well as the KW pack.

I wish for a copy of Dracula X.

Granted. You think it's funny.

I wish for pencil sharpener

Granted. University Of Pencils is founded in your name.

I wish for a reply.
